title: AMD Ryzen 3900XT, 3800XT, 3600XT Review and Benchmarks - The Choice Is OBVIOUS!
description: Before Zen 3 launches the AMD Zen refresh 3000XT processors are here and they have a lot to prove.  The Ryzen 9 3900XT, Ryzen 7 3800XT and Ryzen 5 3600XT benchmarks directly compete versus the 3900XT, 3800X and 3600X rather than against anything in the Intel lineup.  Remember, these are updates to some of the best CPUs in 2020 so they have to be REALLY good to stand out    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Ryzen 9 3900X -      Ryzen 7 3800X -   Ryzen 5 3600X -     Check out the new Xenia Gaming Notebook -     0:00 - Intro 1:48 - Why Refresh NOW? 3:10 - 3000XT Specs 3:51 - Understanding Frequencies 5:50 - Pricing Gets Ugly 6:46 - Real World Benchmarks 7:39 - Gaming Benchmarks 8:15 - Power Consumption 8:36 - A Big MEH!  Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by AMD. This video is sponsored by XPG's new Xenia gaming notebook. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  ryzen93900xt #ryzen73800xt #ryzen53600xt #hardwarecanucks
